calculators.title: Calculators
calculators.subtitle: Practical tools for architects and design engineers: quickly select systems, materials, and components for roofing, facades, and drainage.
calculators.note: Calculator outputs include basic reserves/tolerances. For working documentation, validate results for the specific project conditions.

flow.step1: Choose a calculator for your task
flow.step3: Get a ready bill of materials

flat-roof-2023.name: Flat Roof 2023
flat-roof-2023.purpose: Calculates material demand for a flat PVC roof with membrane, insulation, fastening, flashings, and funnels.
flat-roof-2023.inputs: Membrane type, insulation setup, fastening method, substrate type, insulation thickness, roof area/perimeter/flashings, upstand height, drip edge and strip lengths.
flat-roof-2023.result: Consolidated quantity schedule for membranes, geotextiles, vapor barrier, primer, fixings, funnels, and related items.

pitched-roof-2023-09.name: Pitched Roof 2023 09
pitched-roof-2023-09.purpose: Material calculation for pitched roof systems (likely bitumen shingles with supporting layers).
pitched-roof-2023-09.inputs: Roof slope geometry, pitch values, roof zones/sections, and selection of main covering and underlayment materials.
pitched-roof-2023-09.result: Required quantities for main roofing and accessories (underlayments, junction elements, and additional materials).

ttr-sumishenogo-pokryttya.name: TTR Combined Roof Assembly
ttr-sumishenogo-pokryttya.purpose: Thermal calculation of a combined roof assembly per DBN/DSTU with heat-transfer resistance compliance checks.
ttr-sumishenogo-pokryttya.inputs: City/climate zone, building type, layer stack (lining, bearing part, slope-forming layer, vapor/hydro insulation, insulation, outer finish), selected materials, and thicknesses.
ttr-sumishenogo-pokryttya.result: Required insulation thickness, compliance check (Rsum >= Rqmin), and report-ready layer parameter tables.

soffit-2025.name: Soffit 2025
soffit-2025.purpose: Calculates materials for roof overhang soffit lining (soffit panels, J/H profiles) with geometry and waste optimization.
soffit-2025.inputs: Panel/brand type, section length and actual overhang width, slope angle, count of identical sections, paired sections with shared area, manual extra J/H profile lengths, option for J-profile only on inner perimeter.
soffit-2025.result: Brand-specific quantities (Asko/Soffit/Aydaho): panels, J-profiles, and H-profiles with reserve.

siding-2-5.name: Siding 2.5
siding-2-5.purpose: Calculates materials for facade cladding with siding/facade panels, including walls, gables, windows, and doors.
siding-2-5.inputs: Wall dimensions (width/height/count), gable geometry, window and door dimensions/count, options for start/finish strips, J-profile, trims, and curb strips.
siding-2-5.result: Final bill of materials for panels and accessories (strips, profiles, fasteners, insulation, membrane) with quantities.

recyfix-standart-100.name: Recyfix Standart 100 Variants
recyfix-standart-100.purpose: Selects a component set for HAURATON Recyfix Standard 100 linear drainage by channel and grate type.
recyfix-standart-100.inputs: Sheet variant selection (type 60/80/01/010, galvanized or cast-iron grates) and line-item quantities.
recyfix-standart-100.result: Itemized specification with article codes and quantities: channels, sand traps, grates, crossbars, bolts, end caps, and sealant.

profil-kolina.name: PROFIL Double-Socket Elbows
profil-kolina.purpose: Selects quantities of drainage system components for PROFIL and related systems using prepared specification tables.
profil-kolina.inputs: System block/diameter selection (PROFIL 90/130 and Raiko/Fitt blocks) with quantity adjustments per line item.
profil-kolina.result: Table specification in pcs: gutters, holders, connectors, end caps, funnels, elbows, pipes, corners, and related components.
